NIBS_HardwareSoftware.Description: transcranial direct current stimulation with 10 s fade in/out

NIBS_Procedure.StimulationProcedure: Electrical stimulation was delivered via two rubber electrodes inserted in saline-soaked sponges. The target electrode size was 5 x 5 cm while the return electrode size was 6 × 7 cm. Electrodes were kept in place with the use of elastic bands, which ensured a homogeneous pressure on the electrode surface and minimized the probability of drops in current density.
